mapper.select: SELECT tedw.node_id, tedw.water_data_time, tedw.water_data_value, tedw.water_data_increase_value FROM t_energy_data_water tedw, (SELECT node_id, MAX(water_data_time) AS water_data_time FROM t_energy_data_water WHERE is_active=1 GROUP BY node_id) t WHERE tedw.is_active=1 AND tedw.node_id=t.node_id AND tedw.water_data_time=t.water_data_time
